con:parameter.con:name: sessionid
con:parameter.con:description: The ID of the current session

con:parameter.con:name: companyid
con:parameter.con:description: The ID of the account you wish to set the defaults for

con:method.name: cart_getcartitems_with_paramaters
con:method.con:description: This function returns all of the items in the cart. It also the closing times of the locations if your company has multipile locations.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: { "product" : { "meta" : "string", "id" : 0, "price" : "string", "currency" : "string", "quantity" : "string", "dateadded" : "string", "lastmodified" : "string", "companyid" : "string", "externalid" : "string", "notes" : "string", "views" : "string", "slug" : "string", "weight" : "string", "image" : "string", "starpline" : "string", "deposit" : "string", "video" : "string", "code" : "string", "description" : "string", "billingnotes" : "string", "showit" : true, "historyid" : 0, "revenue" : 0, "justpicker" : true, "outofstock" : true, "taxrate" : 0, "rating_count" : "string", "branch" : 0, "hasimage" : true, "custom1" : "string", "custom2" : "string", "custom3" : "string", "custom4" : "string", "custom5" : "string", "custom6" : "string", "custom7" : "string", "custom8" : "string", "custom9" : "string", "custom10" : "string", "custom11" : "string", "custom12" : "string", "custom13" : "string", "custom14" : "string", "custom15" : "string", "custom16" : "string", "custom17" : "string", "custom18" : "string", "custom19" : "string", "custom20" : "string", "outputname" : "string", "digital" : true, "mealdeal" : true, "mealdealdescription" : "string" } }
